reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and informative. She's always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor! Prof. Chen makes complex topics easy to understand and provides great real-world examples.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Decent teacher, but assignments can be unclear at times. Lectures are interesting though.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dry lectures and heavy workload. Prof. Wilson seems knowledgeable but isn't great at explaining concepts.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is passionate about chemistry and it shows. Her labs are well-organized and she's always patient with questions.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Brown is excellent at breaking down complex problems. His office hours are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting content, but Dr. Kowalski can sometimes go off on tangents. Grading is fair though.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is an amazing teacher! He makes physics fun and accessible, even for non-majors.

reviews.subject: Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's passion for literature is contagious. Her classes are thought-provoking and encourage critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Wright seems disorganized and often cancels classes. The material is interesting, but the teaching could be better.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Green is an inspiration! Her field trips and hands-on projects make learning about the environment exciting.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Prof. Turing is incredibly knowledgeable, but his assignments can be quite challenging. Great for those who want to be pushed.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez knows her stuff, but the class can be a bit slow-paced at times. Her museum tours are excellent though.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Mind-blowing discussions in every class! Prof. Johnson really makes you question your assumptions about the world.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor brings current events into every lecture, making the subject very relevant. Be prepared for lots of reading!

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Tanaka's practical approach to engineering problems is refreshing. His industry connections are invaluable for internships.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Al-Farsi's accent can be hard to understand at times, but her knowledge of languages is impressive. Office hours are very helpful.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Prof. Shakespeare seems stuck in the past. His writing prompts are uninspiring and he's not open to modern styles.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is at the cutting edge of her field. Her lectures are fascinating and she's great at explaining complex brain functions.

reviews.subject: American History
reviews.review: Prof. Washington brings history to life with his storytelling. His tests are tough but fair. Definitely recommend this class!
